meanings.definition: The act of telling or narrating a sequence of events.
meanings.sent1: Her storying about the camping trip was so exciting.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy storying about my favorite books with my friends.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't stop storying about her new puppy.
meanings.sent4: His storying of the ancient civilization was captivating.
meanings.sent5: The art of storying can transport us to different worlds.

meanings.definition: The process of creating or constructing a narrative.
meanings.sent1: The author's storying of the fantasy world was imaginative.
meanings.sent2: We learned about storying in our creative writing class.
meanings.sent3: The children were storying about their dream adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her storying of the mystery plot kept us guessing.
meanings.sent5: The magic of storying brings characters to life.

meanings.definition: The act of recounting or sharing a personal experience.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's storying of her childhood always makes us smile.
meanings.sent2: We spent the evening storying about our summer vacations.
meanings.sent3: He was storying about his fishing trip with exaggerated details.
meanings.sent4: Her storying of the family reunion was filled with laughter.
meanings.sent5: The power of storying connects us through shared memories.
